Title: Boot Polish
Writer: Bhanu Pratap (dialogue), Bhanu Pratap (photoplay), Bhanu Pratap (story)
Actors: Kumari Naaz, Rattan Kumar, David Abraham, Chand Burke
Plot: Preteen brother and sister, abandoned by their father to care of an abusive prostitute aunt, survive life in an Indian squatters' camp, aided by a friendly cripple, by learning to shine shoes instead of begging.
